DOC.criteria: Adult male Ages 2040 Healthy Age less 20 great 40 Female sex Use medication herbal vitamin supplement study less one month prior enrollment study Body mass index ( BMI ) less 20 great 25 Changes 5 pound weight ( increase decrease ) month prior enrollment study Participation 300 minute exercise per week month prior enrollment study plan change exercise level study Known diabetes prediabetes ( base prior diagnosis ; use medication low glucose ; fast blood glucose > 100mg/dL screen ) Untreated hypertension ( define systolic blood pressure > 140mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 90mmHg ) Use nicotinecontaining product , include inhale , chew , patch study .
